In England, in the seven days to 27 March, there were 30,484 new confirmed cases (54.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 20 March, there were 31,416 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 3% (932 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 01 April is 3,804,506 (6,759.1 cases per 100,000 population).
